ovdesc.p: This is a PARAMETER for DW.EXPORT application

desc.p: This field will be used when the TAKEOVER field is specified as 'ONLINE'.
The value in this field is the database that will be updated when a record of the current.
DW.EXPORT record is modified or created. The table information will be obtained from the OL.TARGET.TABLE field.
This is the format in which the data will be extracted in.
This is a NOINPUT field, it will be defaulted to UTF-16BE
This is the delimiter with which the data will be delimited in the extract
This is a NOINPUT field, it will be defaulted to '~'
This field will have the details of the applications that will be extracted for this company
The value given in this field should have a record in DW.EXPORT application
This is the path in which the data will be extracted to for the particular COMPANY record
Different paths should be given for different company extracts.
when a Company ID is specified in this field, all the records in that company will be extracted as part of the company which is the ID of the DW.EXPORT.PARAM record
This field specifies for which product the extraction is going to be happen.
Available Products: Insight ,Insight-Risk,Insight-Oi.
A routine can be attached in this field.
A user defined routine which has the logic to move the extracted data from the T24 server to Insight server
The user routine should have a entry in PGM.FILE with TYPE as 'S'
A sample routine DW.TRANSFER.ROUTINE is provided by Temenos
This field specifies on which Frequency pattern the extraction is going to be happen.
Frequency Pattern:
1.Daily
a.Daily
b. Business Day
2.Weekly
a.Every 'n' Week(s)
3.Monthly
a.Twice Monthly
b.Every 'n' Month(s) On 'n' th day
4.Defined
a.LHFYR- LAST DAY IN THIS MID YEAR
b.LQUAT- LAST DAY OF THIS QUARTER
c.LYEAR- LAST DAY OF THIS YEAR
d.LMNTH- LAST DAY OF THIS MONTH
e.LWEEK- LAST DAY OF THIS WEEK
No input field. This will be updated for the online extraction.
This is to note how many times the system re-tried to push the transaction from T24 to 3rd party database, in case of network failure or database failure.
A description about the DW.EXPORT.PARAM record
This is the ID of the field, it accepts the COMPANY.ID and SYSTEM as value
SYSTEM record will be defined with DW.ONLINE.UPDATE field alone.
COMPANY ID will have the details of the path, Unicode format, delimiter and TRANSFER.ROUTINE
Branch company ID will not be allowed as a record in DW.EXPORT.PARAM
This field will control in which format data's will be extracted
It has 3 options, ONLINE, INCREMENTAL, BOTH
Input field, should accept only numbers.
This is to specify how many times system should re-try to push the transaction from T24 to 3rd party database, in case of network failure or database failure.
This field is used to enable or disable the reconciliation process for DW.EXPORT
This field will accept only YES or NO or Null(" "),Both NULL and NO are same and default value is NULL.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
